SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.ADMIN_NUM , b.UPLOAD_AT, b.HITS, a.ADMIN_NAME AS writer, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.UPLOAD_AT DESC) AS RNM FROM BOARD b JOIN ADMIN a ON a.ADMIN_NUM = b.ADMIN_NUM WHERE b.DEL_YN = 'N' ) t WHERE RNM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.ADMIN_NUM, b.UPLOAD_AT, b.HITS, a.ADMIN_NAME AS writer, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.UPLOAD_AT DESC) AS RNM FROM BOARD b JOIN ADMIN a ON a.ADMIN_NUM = b.ADMIN_NUM WHERE b.CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id} AND b.DEL_YN = 'N' ) g WHERE RNM BETWEEN #{pageDto.start} AND #{pageDto.end}
